abstract: Hudson's Bay agrees to form real estate joint ventures with real estate investment trusts Simon Property Group and RioCan Real Estate Investment Trust in separate deals that will cut its debt by around 1.1 billion Canadian dollars, or $873 million.
lead_paragraph: The separate deals sent Hudson’s Bay’s shares soaring over 20 percent on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

headline.main: Hudson’s Bay in Joint Ventures With 2 REITs to Cut Debt
headline.print_headline: Hudson’s Bay in Joint Ventures With 2 Reits to Cut Debt

snippet: The separate deals sent Hudson’s Bay’s shares soaring over 20 percent on the Toronto Stock Exchange.
